name: March of the robots
description:
"March of the robots" was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 30.

Build, mine and conquer!

Hints:

  • Build a factory
  • Use the up/down buttons to move robots into space. Use the send buttons to send them to other worlds.
  • Stop harvesting before every plant is destroyed.
  • The game is quite heavy on CPU usage. Sadly Unity3D is not an optimal solution for games with lots of game entities...

by David Weikersdorfer -- @danvil -- Ludum Dare entry page -- sourc
